cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence

Class WavePropagationFunction<T extends cz.cuni.mff.kocur.base.Location>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence.WavePropagationFunction<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of object that will be passed during propagation. (an object that we are doing the propagation for)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    cz.cuni.mff.kocur.agent.BotFunction<java.lang.Integer,T>, PropagationFunction<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WavePropagationWithContext

    public class WavePropagationFunction<T extends cz.cuni.mff.kocur.base.Location>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PropagationFunction<T>
    This is a representation of "bfs" like propagation function. It should spread to some distance regarding with regards to obstacles.
    Author:
    kocur

    • Method Detail

      • propagate

        public void propagate(InfluenceLayer l,
                      T e)
        This propagates a passed influence layer. In WPF we spread in a wave-like manner. We decrease distance with each step and we spread the influence accordingly.
        Specified by:
        propagate in interface PropagationFunction<T extends cz.cuni.mff.kocur.base.Location>
